entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
